name: starwars-express
description: * Install the sequelize and mysql2 npm packages. * Delete the orm from config. In your app folder, create a model folder with a character.js file in the model * In character.js, model out the character table, as detailed in the schema.sql file located in the root of this project directory. * Remove all references to the old orm file and replace it with character.js * Use Sequelize methods in place of the orm calls to retrieve and insert data. * Update connection.js to use sequelize instead of the mysql package.
